About.title: About Setwise
About.intro: Setwise is an app for lifters who want to log their workouts smarter – not just "weight × reps".

focus.title: We focus on:
focus.content:
• advanced set logging (RIR/RPE, tempo, range of motion, intensifiers)
• clear progress analytics over time
• reliable performance even when the signal at the gym is poor.

developer.title: Independent Development
developer.content: Setwise is being developed as an independent project by Jernej Peternel – an enthusiast of strength training and mobile app development.

goal.title: The app's goal is simple:
goal.content: less time typing on your phone, more focus on training.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.intro:
These terms of use govern the use of the website setwise.app and the mobile application Setwise.

By using the website, signing up for the waitlist, or creating an account in the app, you confirm that you agree to these terms.

whoIsBehind.title: 1. Who is Behind Setwise
whoIsBehind.content:
Setwise is operated by:

Jernej Peternel — Founder & Developer
jernej.peternel@setwise.app

Ožbolt Klemenčič — Co-Founder & Developer
ozbolt.klemencic@setwise.app

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of the App
purpose.content:
Setwise is an app for logging workouts and basic progress analytics.

The app does not constitute health advice and does not replace consultation with a doctor, physiotherapist, or exercise specialist. All workouts are performed at your own risk.

beta.title: 3. Beta Version
beta.content:
Setwise is currently in beta phase. This means that:

• errors may occur, some features may not work, or data may be lost
• features may change or be removed
• we may change or terminate access to the app or parts of the app at any time

We cannot accept responsibility for data loss or other consequences related to the use of the beta version, except to the extent expressly required by applicable law.

accountUsage.title: 4. Account Usage
accountUsage.content:
As a user, you agree to:

• provide accurate basic information where required
• protect your account access and not share it with others
• use the app in accordance with applicable law and these terms

We may limit or terminate your account or access to the app if you:

• use the app in a way that harms us or other users
• attempt to exploit security vulnerabilities
• violate applicable law or these terms of use

content.title: 5. Content You Enter into the App
content.content:
All data you enter into the app (e.g., workouts, exercises, sets, weights, notes) remain your data.

By entering them, you give us permission to process them as part of the app's operation, including:

• storage and backups
• display within the app (e.g., statistics, analytics)
• technical processes for maintaining and improving the service

Processing of your data is described in more detail in the Privacy Policy.

aiFeatures.title: 6. AI Features
aiFeatures.content:
Some Setwise features may use artificial intelligence models (e.g., for converting text workout descriptions into a structured plan).

• content you enter into AI features is sent to a selected provider (currently Google AI Studio), which returns the result
• we do not guarantee that results will always be complete, accurate, or suitable for your specific case
• AI results do not constitute professional or health advice

Use of AI features is voluntary – if you don't want to use them, simply don't use them.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
We strive to keep the app as stable as possible, however:

• we do not guarantee that the app will always be available or error-free
• we do not guarantee that all data will always be correctly saved or synchronized
• we are not liable for indirect damages (e.g., lost workout data, lost progress, disruptions in app use), except where expressly required by law

You are always responsible for your own training, choice of weights, techniques, and training frequency.

privacyConnection.title: 8. Connection to Privacy Policy
privacyConnection.content:
These terms of use are closely linked to our Privacy Policy, which describes how we process your personal data.

Both documents are available at:
setwise.app/terms
setwise.app/privacy

By using the app, you confirm that you have familiarized yourself with both documents.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We may update these terms of use from time to time. The updated version will always be published at setwise.app/terms with the date of the last update.

If there are significant changes, we will try to notify you through the app or email (if appropriate).

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content:
For questions regarding these terms of use, you can contact:

Jernej Peternel
Email: jernej.peternel@setwise.app

Ožbolt Klemenčič
Email: ozbolt.klemencic@setwise.app

General: info@setwise.app

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. It is SetWise's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and applications.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the App includes: Personal Data and Derivative Data.

usage.title: 3. Use of Your Information
usage.content: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we use information collected about you via the App to create and manage your account.

dataProtection.title: 4. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable.

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how SetWise uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners in order to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.

howWeUse.title: 2. How we use cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies for several reasons. Some cookies are required for technical reasons in order for our Website to operate, and we refer to these as 'essential' or 'strictly necessary' cookies.

managingCookies.title: 3. Managing cookies
managingCookies.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie rights by setting your preferences in the Cookie Consent Manager.

Metadata.title: SetWise - Workout Tracker for Serious Lifters
Metadata.description: SetWise is the ultimate workout tracker for serious lifters. Build routines, track progress, and reach your goals with AI-powered insights.
Metadata.keywords: workout tracker, fitness app, workout logging, progress tracking, strength

hero.subtitle: SetWise is the ultimate workout tracker for serious lifters. Build routines, track progress, and reach your goals with AI-powered insights.

feature1.title: Train with precision.
feature1.description: If you track progress by feel, you’ll miss it more often than you think. SetWise visualizes every lift by exercise, from volume to top sets, so progress is obvious.

feature2.title: From
feature2.description: Already have a plan in a PDF or your notes? Just paste it. SetWise converts it into a clean, structured program you can start logging right away.

feature3.title: Built to
feature3.description: Fewer taps, faster logging. SetWise keeps everything you need on one screen, so you don’t break your training flow.

BentoGrid.title: Plan less. Execute more.
BentoGrid.subtitle: Spot improvements, plateaus, and next steps instantly. Progress becomes obvious. Make smarter decisions after every session.

trackAnalyze.title: Track. Analyze. Improve.
trackAnalyze.description: Turn workout data into progress. You can see your progress in real-time on graphs.

offline.title: No internet. No excuses.
offline.description: Track sessions, sets, and timers offline - everything saves automatically.

details.title: Details drive progress
details.description: Reps and weight don't tell the full story. Capture tempo, ROM, and intensifiers with quick notes, and turn every session into actionable progress.

progress.title: Progress Overview
progress.description: See trends, spot patterns, and push past plateaus. Every rep counts, every set matters.

Testimonials.headline: Loved by
Testimonials.headlineRest: serious lifters. Proven in real training.
Testimonials.description: SetWise is built for people who take training seriously. See what users say saved them the most time and helped them keep progressing.

reviews.name: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.reviewText: SetWise streamlined my entire training workflow. I used to spend hours on manual entry, now it's all automated. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Mark Thompson
reviews.reviewText: The insights I get from SetWise are game-changing. It really helps me make data-driven decisions for my athletes.

reviews.name: Elena Rodriguez
reviews.reviewText: Incredible user experience and support. The team at SetWise really cares about their customers' success.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Explore your data, build your dashboard, bring your team together.

items.question: What analytics does SetWise provide?
items.answer: Progress charts and filters per exercise and time range, so you can visualize strength trends, consistency, and performance changes at a glance.

items.question: How is my data stored?
items.answer: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We believe your workout data belongs to you, so we offer full JSON/CSV exports at any time.

items.question: Is SetWise fast to use during a workout?
items.answer: Yes - logging is designed for speed. Most sets take seconds to record, with advanced options (RPE/RIR, tempo, notes) available when you need them.

items.question: Can it handle my training style (strength, bodybuilding, powerbuilding)?
items.answer: Yes. It supports straight sets, supersets, and advanced set types (e.g., drop sets, rest-pause, myo-reps), so it fits most programs.

items.question: How does 'Paste Import' work - and what formats does it understand?
items.answer: Paste any workout as plain text (from Notes, WhatsApp, Excel, or copied text). SetWise uses LLM-powered parsing to recognize exercises, sets, reps, and common set types - then converts it into a clean, structured workout you can log instantly. It's designed to handle different writing styles and messy formatting.

items.question: Will this feel too advanced or complicated?
items.answer: No. SetWise adapts to your style - keep it simple with weight/reps only, or toggle Advanced Tracking when you want details like RPE / RIR, tempo, ROM, and intensifiers.

items.question: Can I see progress per exercise (not just overall)?
items.answer: Yes - analytics are exercise-level, with filters for time ranges and key metrics so you can zoom in on any lift.

items.question: Does it work offline in the gym?
items.answer: Yes. You can log offline and sync later when you're back online.

FAQPage.heading: Answers to your <primary>questions</primary>
FAQPage.description: Everything important in one place. No hidden accordion content, just clear answers you can skim quickly.

installIos.question: How do I install SetWise on iPhone?
installIos.answer: Open the app URL in Safari, tap Share, then choose 'Add to Home Screen'. This gives you a full-screen app icon and faster access.

installAndroid.question: How do I install SetWise on Android?
installAndroid.answer: Open the app URL in Chrome, tap the three-dot menu, then choose 'Install App' (or 'Add to Home Screen' on some devices).

guideFirstWorkout.question: Where should I start if I am new to SetWise?
guideFirstWorkout.answer: Start with the installation guide, then follow the 'Create Workout' guide. You can begin with a simple routine and add advanced tracking later.

guidePasteImport.question: Can I import a workout from notes or messages?
guidePasteImport.answer: Yes. Use Paste Import to convert plain text plans into structured workouts. The parser understands most common lifting formats.

featuresOffline.question: Does SetWise work without internet in the gym?
featuresOffline.answer: Yes. SetWise is offline-first. You can log workouts without signal and sync when your connection is available again.

featuresAnalytics.question: What analytics can I track in SetWise?
featuresAnalytics.answer: You can track volume trends, estimated strength progress, and exercise history with practical filters for date range and performance.

featuresAdvanced.question: Can I log advanced set details like RPE or tempo?
featuresAdvanced.answer: Yes. You can keep logging simple or add advanced fields like RPE/RIR, tempo, notes, and other workout context when needed.

accountBeta.question: Do I need an account to use the app?
accountBeta.answer: Core usage is focused on fast start and practical logging. Account-related flows are available where needed for sync, updates, and beta access.

accountData.question: Can I export my workout data?
accountData.answer: Yes. SetWise supports data export so you can keep control of your training history and backup your progress.

SplitBlue.headline: Built by

Footer.description: Your goals, simplified. Train, track, and level up with SetWise.

FeaturesPage.title: Features
FeaturesPage.description: Discover all the powerful features SetWise offers to help you reach your fitness goals.
FeaturesPage.heading: Everything you need in the <brand>SetWise</brand> app

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: SetWise is a workout tracker app for iPhone, designed around one simple principle: fast logging, smart analytics, real progress. Currently in beta, SetWise already offers the most intuitive workout logging experience — tailored for athletes, bodybuilders, and fitness enthusiasts who want to maximize every workout.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Add a set with just 2 taps. Between sets, spend less time on your phone and more focused on lifting.

offline.title: Offline-First Approach
offline.description: Training in the gym with no signal? SetWise works completely offline. Your workout never stops.

compare.title: Auto-Compare
compare.description: Every exercise shows your previous performance and all-time record. You know exactly what to beat.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Volume charts, strength curves, muscle heatmap and RPE tracking for serious progress.

liveSession.text: allows logging every set without switching screens. Open a workout, see history and PRs for each exercise, enter weight and reps, tap ✓. Between sets, a built-in rest timer alerts you when it's time for the next set.

manualLog.text: allows adding past workouts. Forgot to log yesterday? Simply add the date, exercises and sets — the system updates all stats.

platesCalc.text: calculates the exact plate combination for your target weight (e.g. "2× 20kg + 2× 15kg + 2× 2.5kg = 95kg").

myTemplates.text: are your saved workouts. Create a "Push Day" template with all exercises, and open it every week — all exercises are there with history and PRs.

publicPrograms.text: include proven programs: Starting Strength, StrongLifts 5×5, PPL Split, Upper/Lower Split. Each program has instructions, set/rep schemes and automatic progression.

workoutLog.text: stores all your workouts with date, volume, duration, and quick preview.

personalRecords.text: automatically detects PRs: 1RM (one rep max), Volume PR, Total Weight PR. When you set a new record, SetWise congratulates you.

calendarView.text: shows a monthly training calendar with color indicators (green = high volume, yellow = shorter workout, gray = rest day).

volumeCharts.text: Show total volume. Linear increase means progress.

strengthCurves.text: Calculate estimated 1RM (Epley & Brzycki) and show growth.

muscleHeatmap.text: 3D visualization of muscle groups and intensity.

rpeTracking.text: Record Rate of Perceived Exertion (1-10 scale).

dropSupersets.title: Drop & Supersets
dropSupersets.description: The system automatically links sets and tracks total volume.

autoCompare.title: Auto-Compare
autoCompare.description: Real-time feedback during live session ("+5kg more than last time").

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: End-to-end encryption, multi-device support and backup.

beta.title: Beta Access
beta.description: SetWise is in closed beta. Beta testers keep lifetime free access after launch.

step1.title: Start Workout
step1.description: Tap the button on the home screen, choose a template or empty workout.

step2.title: Add Exercises
step2.description: Select an exercise (e.g. Bench Press), see history and PR.

step3.title: Log Sets
step3.description: Enter weight and reps. Rest timer starts counting down automatically.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted during sync (256-bit).

localStorage.title: Local-First Storage
localStorage.description: Data stays on your device. No account required.

overview.title: Installation Overview
overview.description: SetWise is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be installed directly from your browser. It works offline and behaves just like a native app.

step2.text: Tap the Share button in the toolbar.

step3.text: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
Tap 'Install App' or 'Add to Home Screen'.

step2.text: Click the install icon in the address bar.

step3.text: Launch from your desktop or applications folder.

clearCache.text: If you have issues, try clearing your browser cache.

updateBrowser.text: Ensure you are using the latest version of your browser.

contactSupport.text: Reach out if you need help.

checkConnection.text: Ensure you have an active internet connection for first install.
